item.title: Broadcom 推出 Jericho 芯片，推动人工智能数据中心网络发展
item.description: 博通公司（Broadcom）芯片部门周一推出了下一代 Jericho 网络芯片，该芯片旨在连接相距 60 英里（96.5 公里）以上的数据中心，并加快人工智能计算速度。【原文：Broadcom's silicon division launched its next-generation Jericho networking chip on Monday, which is designed to connect data centers over 60 miles (96.5 km) apart and speed artificial intelligence computation.】

item.title: 由于重新谈判的合同有助于提高利润率，肯德基第一季度利润飙升
item.description: Kyndryl Holdings 公司周一表示，该公司第一季度利润飙升了五倍多，原因是前 IBM 部门重新谈判合同有助于提高其服务利润率。【原文：Kyndryl Holdings' first-quarter profit soared more than five-fold, the company said on Monday, as the former IBM unit's renegotiation of contracts helped improve margins on its services.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 盈利不及预期，原因是巴西自由发货的增长损害了利润率
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 周一公布，由于巴西免费送货服务的增加推动了销售额的增长，但也打击了利润率，其第二季度净利润同比下降 1.5%，低于分析师的预期。【原文：Latin American e-commerce giant MercadoLibre on Monday posted a 1.5% dip in its second-quarter net profit from a year earlier, missing analysts' estimates, as increased free shipping in Brazil drove sales up but also hit margins.】

item.title: 由于天然气价格上涨、产量强劲，Coterra Energy 第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 由于产量增加和美国天然气价格反弹抵消了油价疲软的影响，Coterra Energy 公司周一公布的第二季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Coterra Energy beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Monday, as higher production volumes and a rebound in U.S. natural gas prices offset weaker oil prices.】

item.title: IAC 季度核心利润因数字媒体业务增长而上升
item.description: 本周一，IAC 公布第二季度核心利润增长 15%，主要得益于其最大业务的稳步增长和运营费用的减少。【原文：IAC posted a 15% rise in second-quarter core profit on Monday, helped by the steady growth of its biggest business and a reduction in operating expenses.】

item.title: 人工智能需求激增，Palantir 再次上调年度收入预期
item.description: Palantir Technologies 公司周一今年第二次上调了年收入预期，预计企业和政府对其人工智能相关服务的需求强劲。【原文：Palantir Technologies on Monday raised its forecast for annual revenue for the second time this year, expecting robust demand for its artificial intelligence-linked services from businesses and governments.】

item.title: 独家报道美联储戴利称降息时机已到，可能需要两次以上降息
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周一表示，鉴于越来越多的证据表明美国就业市场正在疲软，而且没有迹象表明关税驱动的通胀会持续下去，降息的时机已经临近。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Monday said that given mounting evidence that the U.S. job market is softening and no signs of persistent tariff-driven inflation, the time is nearing for interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 政府称，埃尔泰尼恩特坍塌事故发生后，Codelco 公司必须提交报告才能重启地下采矿活动
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份政府文件，智利国营矿业公司 Codelco (COBRE.UL) 在重新启动其埃尔泰尼恩特铜矿的地下作业之前，必须就上周地震后造成六人死亡的塌方事故提交四份报告。【原文：Chilean state-run miner Codelco (COBRE.UL) must produce four reports on the collapse at its El Teniente copper mine that killed six people after an earthquake last week, according to a government document seen by Reuters on Monday, before it can restart its underground operations there.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴西选择地方救济而非报复美国关税
item.description: 熟悉巴西政府策略的消息人士称，巴西政府暂时搁置了对本周生效的美国高额关税进行直接报复的计划，而是将重点放在为受征税打击最严重的行业提供救济方案上。【原文：Brazil's government has set aside for now plans for direct retaliation against steep U.S. tariffs taking effect this week, focusing instead on a relief package for industries hit hardest by the levies, sources familiar with the strategy said.】

item.title: Stone 获得 IBD 融资，为亚马逊地区的企业提供信贷服务
item.description: 巴西支付公司 Stone 周一表示，该公司已从美洲开发银行私人投资部门获得 2.95 亿雷亚尔（约合 5340 万美元）的融资，用于扩大对中小型公司的信贷服务，重点是巴西偏远的亚马逊法属地区。【原文：Brazilian payments company Stone said on Monday it has secured 295 million reais ($53.4 million) in financing from the Inter-American Development Bank's private investment arm to expand credit offerings to small and mid-sized companies, focusing on Brazil's remote Legal Amazon region.】

item.title: 受人工智能和寻求增长的推动，全球并购达到 2.6 万亿美元的年度峰值
item.description: 全球交易额已达 2.6 万亿美元，是自 2021 年大流行病时期高峰以来今年前七个月的最高值，这是因为企业董事会追求增长和人工智能活动激增的影响克服了美国关税带来的不确定性。【原文：Global dealmaking has reached $2.6 trillion, the highest for the first seven months of the year since the 2021 pandemic-era peak, as a quest for growth in corporate boardrooms and the impact of a surge in AI activity has overcome the uncertainty caused by U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 桥水公司创始人雷-达里奥敦促特朗普公布解雇高级劳工官员的原因
item.description: 投资者雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）周一表示，他也很可能会解雇劳工统计局局长，因为他 "认为数据不好"，但他敦促美国总统唐纳德-特朗普公开解雇她背后的原因。【原文：Investor Ray Dalio said on Monday he, too, would likely have fired the commissioner of the Bureau of Labor Statistics because he "believes the data is not good", but urged U.S. President Donald Trump to disclose the reasoning behind her removal.】

item.title: Figma 在巨额首次公开募股几天后市值缩水 110 亿美元
item.description: 周一，Figma 的股价因获利回吐而下跌了 23%，这是因为人们对这家设计软件公司的热情在其首次公开募股后的几天里有所减退。【原文：Shares of Figma slumped 23% on profit taking on Monday, as euphoria over the design software firm waned days after its blockbuster initial public offering.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司的 A 类股因 38 亿美元减记和运营利润疲软而下跌
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）A类股在周一下午的交易中下跌了 3%，原因是投资者对该公司周六披露的 38 亿美元减记和季度营业利润下滑感到担忧。【原文：Class A shares of Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway fell 3% in afternoon trading on Monday, as investors fretted over a $3.8 billion write-down and a dip in quarterly operating profit that the firm disclosed on Saturday.】

item.title: 萤火虫公司上调价格区间后，目标是在美国首次公开募股中获得高达 60 亿美元的估值
item.description: Firefly公司在周一提交的一份文件中说，该公司在美国上市的目标估值高达60.4亿美元，在人们对太空公司兴趣高涨的情况下，该公司提高了定价范围。【原文：Firefly is targeting a valuation of up to $6.04 billion in its U.S. listing, the company said in a filing on Monday, raising its pricing range amid heightened interest in space companies.】

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行利用衍生工具将 BPM 银行股份增至 20.1%
item.description: 周一的一份监管文件显示，法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole）通过衍生工具又收购了 Banco BPM 0.3% 的股份，使其在这家意大利第三大银行的持股比例增至 20.1%。【原文：French bank Credit Agricole has acquired a further 0.3% of Banco BPM via derivatives, raising its stake in Italy's third-biggest bank to 20.1%, a regulatory filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 就业数据的修订让美国政府统计员丢了饭碗
item.description: 对之前估计的美国 5 月和 6 月薪资增长规模的修正，促使唐纳德-特朗普总统于周五解雇了劳工统计局局长艾丽卡-麦肯塔弗（Erika McEntarfer）。【原文：The revisions to previous estimates of the size of U.S. payrolls gains for May and June that prompted President Donald Trump to fire Bureau of Labor Statistics Commissioner Erika McEntarfer on Friday were by any measure extraordinarily large.】

item.title: 西班亚-斯蒂尔沃特公司呼吁美国对俄罗斯钯征收关税可能加剧价格波动
item.description: 西班业-斯蒂尔沃特公司已要求美国考虑对俄罗斯钯金进口征收关税，以支持美国钯金供应的长期可行性，此举可能会加剧钯金价格的波动。【原文：Sibanye-Stillwater has asked the United States to consider imposing a tariff on Russian palladium imports to support the long-term viability of U.S. supplies, in a move that could increase volatility in palladium prices.】

item.title: 亚马逊全面改造 Wondery 播客工作室，裁员 110 人
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，亚马逊公司正在重组 Wondery 播客工作室，将《商战》等获奖叙事播客转移到 Audible，并将创作者主导的节目整合到一个新的部门。【原文：Amazon.com is restructuring the Wondery podcast studio by shifting its award-winning narrative podcasts such as "Business Wars" to Audible and consolidating creator-led shows into a new unit, according to a memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 埃里克和小特朗普支持的制造业 SPAC 申请 3 亿美元美国 IPO
item.description: 由埃里克-特朗普（Eric Trump）和小唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump Jr.）支持的空头支票公司 New America Acquisition I Corp 周一申请在美国首次公开募股，募集资金高达 3 亿美元。【原文：New America Acquisition I Corp, a blank-check firm backed by Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr., on Monday filed for an initial public offering of up to $300 million in the United States.】

item.title: 安森美公布季度收入下降，市场不确定性导致第三季度利润黯淡
item.description: 美国汽车芯片制造商 Onsemi 周一预计第三季度利润乏善可陈，此前该公司公布的第二季度收入大幅下降，导致其股价下跌超过 10%。【原文：U.S. automotive chipmaker Onsemi on Monday forecast lackluster profit for the third quarter, after reporting a sharp decline in second-quarter revenue, sending its shares down by more than 10%.】

item.title: 尽管关税缓期执行，莱索托仍表示已经受到伤害
item.description: 莱索托官员和业内人士表示，美国对莱索托商品征收 50%关税的缓期执行为时已晚，无法避免对这个非洲小国纺织业造成损害，该行业已受到数月贸易不确定性的严重打击。【原文：A reprieve from a 50% U.S. tariff on goods from Lesotho has come too late to prevent damage to the tiny African kingdom's textiles industry, which has been hit hard by months of trade uncertainty, officials and industry players said.】

item.title: 汽车零部件销售强劲，博世印度业务部季度利润增长
item.description: 周一，博世公布第一季度利润增长，主要得益于乘用车和非公路用车零配件的强劲销售以及消费电子产品的需求。【原文：Bosch reported a higher first-quarter profit on Monday, helped by strong sales of spare auto parts to passenger and off-highway vehicles as well as demand for its consumer electronic goods.】

item.title: 特朗普称将因购买俄罗斯石油而 "大幅 "提高对印度的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周一表示，他将 周一表示，他将因印度购买俄罗斯石油而大幅提高对印度的关税。 "印度不仅大量购买俄罗斯石油，还在公开市场上出售大部分石油，从中牟取暴利。他们根本不在乎乌克兰有多少人被俄罗斯的战争机器杀害，"特朗普在 "真理社交 "网站上发表文章说。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday he will substantially raise tariffs on India over its purchases of Russian oil. "India is not only buying massive amounts of Russian Oil, they are then, for much of the Oil purchased, selling it on the Open Market for big profits. They don’t care how many people in Ukraine are being killed by the Russian War Machine," Trump said in a post on Truth Social.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Genstar 正探讨以 50 亿美元出售汽车软件制造商 OEConnection
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，Genstar Capital 正在探索出售 OEConnection，其目标是以高达 50 亿美元的价格（包括债务）对这家同样获得福特和通用汽车支持的汽车软件供应商进行估值。【原文：Genstar Capital is exploring a sale of OEConnection, which it aims to value the automotive software provider also backed by Ford and General Motors at as much as $5 billion, including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Price Chopper 和 Tops Friendly Markets 的所有者正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的人士透露，Price Chopper 和 Tops Friendly Markets 的母公司 Northeast Grocery, Inc.【原文：Northeast Grocery, Inc., the parent company of Price Chopper and Tops Friendly Markets, is exploring a sale, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，花旗任命业内资深人士为北美私人信贷主管
item.description: 据路透社周一看到的一份内部备忘录显示，花旗集团已任命 Aashish Dhakad 为其北美私人信贷业务部门的主管，因为各家银行都在争夺利润丰厚的私人信贷市场的更大份额。【原文：Citigroup has appointed Aashish Dhakad as the head of its private credit origination division in North America, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Monday, as banks vie for a larger share of the lucrative private credit market.】

item.title: 凯恩斯技术公司将在印度泰米尔纳德邦投资 5.7 亿美元
item.description: Kaynes Technology India 周一表示，该公司将在未来六年内在南部泰米尔纳德邦投资约 499.5 亿卢比（约合 5.704 亿美元）。【原文：Kaynes Technology India said on Monday its unit will invest roughly 49.95 billion rupees ($570.40 million) over the next six years in the southern state of Tamil Nadu.】

item.title: 高盛任命 Ratesic 为消费零售集团副主席
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份备忘录，高盛已任命 Marko Ratesic 为其投资银行消费零售集团的副主席。【原文：Goldman Sachs has named Marko Ratesic as vice chairman of the consumer retail group within its investment bank, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 6 月工厂订单因飞机订单减少而大幅下降
item.description: 由于商用飞机订单骤减，6 月份美国制成品新订单下降，扭转了上个月飞机订单激增推动订单整体上升的局面。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods fell in June as commercial aircraft orders plunged, reversing the surge in plane orders that had driven the overall upswing in orders in the prior month.】
